languages.english-overview:
Pluck is your small and simple content management system, written in php. With pluck, you can easily manage your own website without knowledge of programming languages.
Pluck focuses on ease of use and enables everyone to manage his own website. This makes pluck an excellent choice for every small website.
Pluck is available under the terms of the GNU General Public License.

font.b: Pluck is packed with some nice features, from which we've listed the most important ones on this page

font.li: create an unlimited amount of pages
create an album to show images or photos to your visitors
include a contact form in your page(s)
